About Us

BHETUKHA and STUMZA WASTE MANAGEMENT COMPANY is a leading provider of waste management services. Our company specializes in handling hazardous waste, recycling materials, and collecting garbage from both construction sites and residential areas.

With a team of experienced professionals, we ensure efficient and environmentally friendly waste disposal solutions. Our goal is to promote sustainability and protect the environment by managing waste responsibly.

At BHETUKHA and STUMZA WASTE MANAGEMENT COMPANY, we are committed to delivering high-quality services to our clients while adhering to the highest safety standards. Contact us today for all your waste management needs.

© 2024 BHETUKHA and STUMZA WASTE MANAGEMENT COMPANY. All rights reserved.
